content: Triggering of right index and middle fingers
title: Chief Complaint

content: The patient reports that his long waterproof cast has become uncomfortable and scratchy, and he is seeking advice regarding the cast. He notes limited wrist motion and thumb motion secondary to pain and immobilization, with multiple skin excoriations on the left upper extremity. He also reports that his right index and middle fingers have begun to trigger. Recent X‑rays demonstrate increased callus formation at the ulna of the right wrist and diffuse callus formation of the radius and ulna on the left.
title: HPI Spencer

title: Musculoskeletal

title: Imaging Results

content:
- Cast discomfort with skin excoriations
- Limited wrist motion secondary to pain
- Increased callus formation of right ulna and left radius/ulna
- Triggering of right index and middle fingers
